short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An experimental AI-powered LinkedIn Update Summarizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Post Toolkit: Your On-Demand AI Powered TL;DR Button and Reply Suggestion generator.
Tired of scrolling through lengthy LinkedIn updates? Wish you could get to the point faster? Want a short reply but don't like the cookie cutter ones that LinkedIn provides? Our extension is here to help!

What We Offer

💻 AI-Powered Summaries: Using cutting-edge language models, we condense lengthy posts into quick, easy-to-read summaries.
💬 NEW: We're introducing the ability to suggest replies that aren't the basic LinkedIn cookie cutter ones.
🧠 NEW: We've added "Explain this" contextual menu when you highlight a word or phrase (in LinkedIn) and make a mouse right-click.
👤 User-Controlled Experience: You choose which posts to summarize - no automatic processing without your consent.
🔏 Privacy-Focused: We don't store your data or use it for training. Summaries are ephemeral and not stored.

Current Status

This extension is in its experimental stage. While we're excited about its potential, please note:

🤔 Results may vary in quality
⛔ The service might occasionally be unavailable

We're constantly working to improve your experience!

How It Works

First, you must activate the extension. Just click in the smiley icon in your extension bar and set the slider to activate.
Then when you encounter a long post, click on the 🙂 emoji underneath the author byline to summarize. To restore original text click on the 🙄 emoji. If you want a short reply generated, fist click on the post to expand the comment section, then click on 💬 in the Summarized toolbar.

Try it today and streamline your LinkedIn experience!
We'd love to hear about your experience. Drop us a line to summarized@paddleboard.ai
